sections.content:
Question:
We are using R7F7010103AFP#KA4.We would like to understand whether this controller can support for external CAN FD transceivers . As of now we are using CAN HS transceivers.
Answer:
The CAN controller of RH850/F1L is not compatible with CAN-FD. From the RH850/F1x series, you can choose RH850/F1KM as next product successor for F1L. F1KM does have a CAN-FD compatible CAN controller installed.
Suitable Products
RH850
